result.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
result.translation: (51) And We have already destroyed your kinds,[1590] so is there any who will remember?
result.footnotes: [1590]- i.e., those similar to you in attitude and behavior when they rejected Allāh's messengers.
